ygData.subject: Heritrix 1.14.3 DOA under Ubuntu 9.04
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been runing the 1.14.3 web crawler under Ubuntu 8.10 for several months.  I just moved on to Ubuntu 9.04, only to find Heritrix s control interface

Subject: Heritrix 1.14.3 DOA under Ubuntu 9.04
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=301098244; y=HpPLnViS7sROv8OmOP2RZyPO4TtGm-CIsXn6qKoEIt9euNL5t-UDiqw
X-Yahoo-Profile: bowser.richard

I have been runing the 1.14.3 web crawler under Ubuntu 8.10 for several mon=
ths.  I just moved on to Ubuntu 9.04, only to find Heritrix's control inter=
face broken here.  The first thing I noticed was that while I can still sta=
rt Heritrix and get into the WUI console to create jobs, major parts of con=
sole functionality are lost. For example, if I try to Shut down Heritrix so=
ftware I get as far as the "Are you sure?" screen, I can go no further. Whe=
never I click on "I'm sure, shut it down" - nothing happens.  However, clic=
king on "Cancel" does cause the request to vanish.  Yet the only way I can =
shut down Heritrix is by rebooting my system (I haven't tried killing the p=
rocess. The shutdown script is DOA.)

Trying to start a job also fails.  I =
can create a job.  The modules button should take me to the configuration p=
age.  But no, it just returns me to the Jobs page which shows the pending j=
ob I'm trying to create.  However, I can click on the "Edit configuration" =
option, which gets me to the configuration page.  Only problem is then ther=
e's no way to get to the "Submit job" button.  I have to use my browser's b=
ack button to get to the console window with that tab.  But if I click it H=
eritrix looses all my configuration options.

It's obvious that something i=
s upsetting normal script functionality here.  Can somebody help me idenitf=
y this problem?

Rich B.
